snippet.title: Zombie Derby - Trailer
snippet.description:
Zombie Derby is a small 3D racing action in the world of zombie apocalypse.

Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n51pfbpzkks
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/831770/Zombie_Derby/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012715
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/zombie-derby-switch/
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n60td50n4s7
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.herocraft.game.zombiederby
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id794913043
More: https://zombiederby.com/part_1/

An apocalypse came, take the wheel and escape! Take control of your car and see if you can actually escape. With 5 upgradeable cars, handsome 3D graphics and gory shambling bodies, Zombie Derby is a killer game. How far can you get before they get YOU? 

Do you have the drive to survive?
